pkgmetadata.longdescription: # redis-rsPython wrapper for redis-rs and redis_cluster_async# Install pip install redis-rs# Using```pythonimport asyncioimport redis_rsx = redis_rs.create_client([ "redis://redis-node001", "redis://redis-node002",], 1)async def main(): print(await x.execute(b"hset", "fooh", "a", b"asdfg")) print(await x.fetch_int("hset", "fooh", "b", 11234567890)) print(await x.fetch_int("hget", "fooh", "b")) print(await x.fetch_str("hget", "fooh", "a")) print(await x.fetch_dict("hgetall", "fooh")) print(await x.execute("cluster", "nodes")) print(await x.fetch_bytes("get", "foo")) print(await x.fetch_int("get", "foo")) print(await x.execute("hgetall", "fooh")) print(await x.execute("zadd", "fooz", 1.5678, "b")) print(await x.fetch_scores("zrange", "fooz", 0, -1, "WITHSCORES"))asyncio.run(main())```
